original: 諸葛亮向魯肅借二十隻船，每船要軍士三十人，船上皆用青布為幔，各束草千餘個，分佈兩邊。魯肅不識箇中玄機，當即允諾。
text: Zhuge Liang borrowed 20 boats from Lu Su. Each boat required 30 sergeants. The boats were covered with blue cloth, and there were more than a thousand grasses on each side. Lu Su did not know the mystery of Xie Zhong, and immediately promised.
